Pre-Game Insights: The Los Angeles Lakers finished 47-35 overall and 27-25 in Western Conference play last season, averaging 118.0 points per game. The Sacramento Kings finished 46-36 overall, 10-7 in Pacific Division play, and 22-19 on the road, averaging 116.6 points per game. The Kings allowed opponents to score 114.8 points per game last season.
Others: Jarred Vanderbilt: out (foot), Christian Wood: out (knee), Christian Koloko: day to day (illness), Jalen Hood-Schifino: out (illness) for the Lakers; Devin Carter: out (shoulder), Orlando Robinson: day to day (MCL) for the Kings.
